name: Mr Potato Token
description: What is the project about? MrPotato project is based on a nostalgic meme character that inspired a generation as a Toy and then generation X as a movie character, now the popular meme is breaking into the Metaverse What makes your project unique? Linking $Potato Meme token liquidity with fun Mr Potato NFT ecosystem and the ability to create user designed endlessly unique MetaPotato NFT game characters which can be swapped anytime 1-1 with $MrPotato token History of your project. 2022-2023 Develop MrPotato Population Metaverse concept • 728 Unique ERC1155 MetaParts Smart Contract Airdrop factory • ERC721 NFT Liquidity Bridge contract • UX and Lucky MintSpin contract • $MrPotato token and MrPotatoNFT Staking contract • MetaPotato GameFi Play2Earn Game contract • SuperRare MRPotatoNFT marketplace managed by decentralized smart contract factory • $MrPotato ERC20 Ethereum token smart contract renounced What’s next for your project? Game Development and Tier1 CEX listings What can your token be used for? $MrPotato token is the MrPotatoNFT ecosystem gas token… can also be liquidated on Centralised CEX and Decentralised DEX , $MrPotato MrPotatoNFT and MetaPotato MintSpins , trading in the MrPotatoNFT marketplace
